title: Python Fundamentals Quiz
instructions: Test your understanding of Python basics. Each question is worth equal points.

questions.question: Which of the following is the correct way to create a list in Python?
questions.explanation: Lists in Python are created using square brackets [], not parentheses or curly braces.

questions.question: What will be the output of: print(type(3.14))?
questions.explanation: Numbers with decimal points are floating-point numbers (float type) in Python.
